scripts.start: npm run build && cd env && deno --allow-read --allow-write --allow-net --allow-env ../dist/main.js
scripts.start:node: npm run build && cd env && NODE_COMPILE_CACHE=~/.node_cache node ../dist/main.js
scripts.start:bun: npm run build && cd env && bun --bun --optimize --smol ../dist/main.js
scripts.build:native: npm run build && mkdir -p build && deno compile -A -o build/logthing ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:native:win32-x64: npm run build && mkdir -p build && deno compile -A --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc -o build/logthing-win32-x64.exe ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:native:linux-x64: npm run build && mkdir -p build && deno compile -A --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu -o build/logthing-linux-x64 ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:native:darwin-x64: npm run build && mkdir -p build && deno compile -A --target x86_64-apple-darwin -o build/logthing-darwin-x64 ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:native:darwin-arm64: npm run build && mkdir -p build && deno compile -A --target aarch64-apple-darwin -o build/logthing-darwin-arm64 ./dist/main.js
scripts.build:native:all: npm run clean:build && npm run build:native:win32-x64 && npm run build:native:linux-x64 && npm run build:native:darwin-x64 && npm run build:native:darwin-arm64
